_description: Follows sharp line movements in prediction markets. Detects rapid price changes and trades in the direction of momentum.
_usage: Best for liquid markets with frequent price updates. Requires market_mappings to map PumpAmp signal market IDs to venue-native IDs. See _mapping_notes for examples.

market_mappings._mapping_notes: Map PumpAmp signal market IDs to venue-native market IDs. Example: kalshi:BTC-100K/YES -> kalshi:KXBTCD-26DEC31
